      static double ComputeTourUtilTools.calculateSegmentDistance​(List<Long> segmentPath, Map map)

      static HashMap<javafx.util.Pair<Long,​Long>,​List<Long>> ComputeTourUtilTools.computeAllShortestPathsWithPaths​(Map map)
      Computes the shortest paths between all pairs of intersections in the map, using the modified Dijkstra algorithm to include the full paths for each pair.
      static HashMap<Long,​PathResult> ComputeTourUtilTools.computeShortestPathsFromSourceWithPaths​(Long sourceId, Map map)
      Computes the shortest paths from a given source intersection to all other intersections in the map using a modified Dijkstra algorithm, which includes the full path for each destination.
      static Tour ComputeTourUtilTools.constructTourWithAllShortestPaths​(List<Long> orderedPoints, Map map, HashMap<javafx.util.Pair<Long,​Long>,​List<Long>> shortestPaths)
      Constructs a tour using precomputed shortest paths between intersections.
      static Tour ComputeTourUtilTools.constructTourWithGeographicZones​(List<Long> orderedPoints, Map map)
      Constructs a tour based on the provided ordered list of intersection IDs, considering geographic zones and computing the shortest path between each successive pair of points.
      static Tour ComputeTourUtilTools.constructTourWithSpecificShortestPaths​(List<Long> orderedPoints, Map map)
      Constructs a tour based on the provided ordered list of intersection IDs, considering specific shortest paths between each successive pair of points.

      Finds the closest point to a given current point from a list of candidate points, while respecting the constraint that a pickup must occur before delivery.
